Method Detail

addTypeDescription

public TypeDescription addTypeDescription(TypeDescription definition)
Make YAML aware how to represent a custom Class. If there is no root Class assigned in constructor then the 'root' property of this definition is respected.

Parameters:
definition - to be added to the Constructor
Returns:
the previous value associated with definition, or null if there was no mapping for definition.
